attributes.title: Horrible app👽
attributes.review: This app is not what I expected at all! First of all, it took 4 days to download, deleted all of my data and made me buy a new phone. That is unacceptable😡. Second right when I got into the app it asked me for my PHONE NUMBER. I immediately felt attacked and harassed😭. You can’t just ask someone for personal information like that. To top that all off it asked FOR MY NAME AND ZIP CODE. I can’t risk someone coming to kill me and my family at night. Also my name is very personal and I feel very offended that you can just straight up ask me that. This is how I would describe this app in emojis: 👁👄👁no❤️🤮🤡. I highly DO NOT recommend this app and if you think about downloading it just think of the personal information that is going to be asked.

attributes.title: The Children
attributes.review: I had trouble downloading the app I got it the day it came out so excited, it just finished downloading this morning. I opened the app so ready to see our 🍑beautiful🍑 country’s leader and found it wasn’t even Obama. But I was asked instead to fill out a an extensive form with consents and to send it to my friends. I figured why not. I got the end and I got a “May the odds be ever in your favor” notification from the app. Then these men came to my house and told me I had been picked for the 2020 annual Hunger Games. I was told that if I voted for trump in November my name would be taken out and I could stay home. I did the gracious thing and put my three fingers in the air waving goodbye to my family as I got into a government van. I was then asked to share the app and to give it 5 stars. I have since escaped from my captors and am living off of gas station Oreos and polar pops. Doing the only thing I can think of I am giving this app 1 star for ruining my life. I am now running from town to town as a wanted criminal please do not download UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES
FAKE NEWS FAKE NEWS FAKE NEWS FAKE NEWS FAKE NEWS FAKE NEWS FAKE NEWS FAKE NEWS FAKE NEWS FAKE NEWS

attributes.title: This app is spooky help
attributes.review:
So I downloaded this app out of curiosity and as soon as I opened it a pale orange tint began spreading on my skin. I also got wrinkly and fat. GUYS HELP. IM TURNING INTO THAT FAT CHEETO!!!!!🤮🤮🤮everywhere I look i see trump 2020. It won’t go away help I am being blinded. I had to get my butler to write this for me. Thanks Bert by the way you’re a real one. Anyways...GUYS HELP. I HAVE TRIED EVERY FORM OF TREATMENT THERE IS AND TALKED TO 27484929 DOCTORS. NONE OF THEM CAN HELP ME! PLEASE I DONT WANT TO BE LIKE THIS ANYMORE!!!! IM SO UGLY!!!😭😭Whenever I go outside I get jumped. Help all of my bones are broken I can’t move. I can’t move I can’t see AND IM UGLY! God I’m dying. I have to go drink 12 diet cokes while I think of what to do. 
Ciao
